siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: MyBee App is a platform to connect skilled trades with clients in real-time. We also help small businesses generate more revenue fast by analyzing growth strategies using the power of AI.
blogPost.body: MyBee App is a platform to connect skilled trades with clients in real-time. We also help small businesses generate more revenue fast by analyzing growth strategies using the power of AI.
blogPost.title: MyBee App - Connecting skilled-trades with clients in real time
blogPost.author: Tariqule Khan

localize.description: MyBee App是一个实时连接熟练交易与客户的平台。我们还通过利用人工智能的力量分析发展战略，帮助小企业快速创造更多的收入。
localize.tagline: 将熟练的交易与客户实时连接起来。

localize.description: MyBee App是一個實時連接熟練交易與客戶的平臺。我們還通過利用人工智能的力量分析發展戰略，幫助小企業快速創造更多的收入。
localize.tagline: 將熟練的交易與客戶實時連接起來。

previous.excerpt: Directual is the only no-code platform that combines the flexibility, scalability, and security of traditional coding, with a modern, visual development approach. You can build scalable, secure and sophisticated apps with Directual.
previous.title: Directual - Power of Coding in No-code format

localize.description: Directual是唯一的无代码平台，它结合了传统编码的灵活性、可扩展性和安全性，以及现代的可视化开发方法。您可以使用Directual构建可扩展、安全和复杂的应用程序。
Directual是唯一的無代碼平臺，它結合了傳統編碼的靈活性、可擴展性和安全性，以及現代的可視化開發方法。您可以使用Directual構建可擴展、安全和複雜的應用程序。

next.excerpt: RelaxTax is the first App in Austria, that is able to create automated tax returns with an electronic submission & follow up to the Austrian Tax Authorities (FinanzOnline). It is available in multiple languages, currently German & English, with more to come.
next.title: RelaxTax - Simplified tax returns for Austria

localize.description: RelaxTax是奥地利的第一个应用程序，能够创建自动报税，并以电子方式提交和跟进奥地利税务机关（FinanzOnline）。它有多种语言版本，目前是德语和英语，以后还会有更多语言版本。
RelaxTax是奧地利的第一個應用程序，能夠創建自動報稅，並以電子方式提交和跟進奧地利稅務機關（FinanzOnline）。它有多種語言版本，目前是德語和英語，以後還會有更多語言版本。
